MyGUI.Tag: Câte modele(pomi,pietre, etc.) vor fi pe traseu
Încarcă traseul (după schimbare) sau reîncarcă traseul curent.
This is the slowest car. Very old and a bit creepy truck. Can drive only on flat tracks and with turtle speed.
Height fog start height [meters] at which fog starts getting denser for smooth distance.
Terrain height below which model won't appear.
Captură de ecran pentru traseul selectat
Fiecare mișcare(mouse/tastă) sau valoare se schimbă cu
Developer keys. Ctrl-F global, Alt-shift-1..6 load test tracks.
Difuziune culoare lumina soarelui (normală).Componente R G B de la 0 la 1 (ex. 0.9 0.9 0.9)
RMB on slider - reset to default value.
W,S A,D Q,E - mișcă săgețile - rotește
Debifează pentru schimbarea manuală a vitezei
F10 - update depth map, after terrain deform near shore
3 - Scale LMB - uniform XYZ RMB: Y MMB: Z
Very heavy and slow car, best for terrain and bumps, easy to drive. But useless on fast and stunt tracks.
Use for steep or mountain layers, max use is 2.
Road banking angles: average and maximum, in degrees.
Tracks list, click to select and see info. Press Enter or [New Game] to drive on it.
Terrain angle above which there won't be any grass (starts fading out, for smooth angle).
Use if needed to scale terrain texture normals, for lighting. Otherwise default 1.
Grass density map - smooth size. Higher will make a smoother transition from road to grass.
ctrl-Space - set new point's values from picked
Fastest car meant for gravel. Light and with a powerful engine. Has great aerodynamics and steerability.
Steering range multiplier, for simulation mode (Easy,Normal).
One axis for throttle and brake
Second best rally car in game, drivable on all tracks with the best experience, similar to ES.
C - simulation toggle for dynamic objects
Good rally car, drivable on all tracks. Similar to S1, but shorter and more steerable.
Car speed rating, more means faster car. Warning, on gravel too fast cars won't be faster because they don't have enough grip.
alt-shift - at start alt-ctrl - at end
shift-LMB - on Brushes, pick only shape (don't change mode).
Enable or disable this grass layer.
Good rally car. Has low height. Is a bit older and less powerful.
Terrain height above which there won't be any grass (starts fading out, for smooth distance).
Best rally car in game, great driving experience on all tracks. A bit high though.
Maximal depth in fluid allowed (set 0 to exclude from fluids).
Cars list. Press Enter or [New Game] to drive with it.
Distance from road to models (global, added to each model's own value).
alt - selectează tot ctrl - nu selectează nimic
Backspace - adaugă sau elimină din selecţie
Good looking car, best fit for asphalt tracks. Can also drive on few flat terrain tracks. But completely undrivable at bumps,jumps,loops or pipes because of low suspension height.
Resize current terrain heightmap by half (use only for reducing file size).
Incompatible protocol version - update Stunt Rally or contact server administrator.
Decreases steering range with higher velocity.
Ins - insert new, default fluid at cursor
Vegetation model groups (recommended use 4-6), affects performance.
Alege traseul selectat pentru sursă de copiere,folosit in tab-ul [Instrumente]
Challenges are short but usually difficult to pass.
Amplitudinea denivelărilor suplimentare pe suprafaţă (cât de mare).
Previne blocarea roții la frânare (implicit: oprit)
If your controller has throttle and brake in one axis, check this. Bind axis to throttle, unbind brake. Use Inverse from throttle if needed.
Fog end color when looking away from sun.
Max. number of viewports (see less, for more player replays)
Good car, suited for all tracks, but has slower acceleration, especially at high speeds.
Models Page length (low will reload often and make too many batches, high will cause visible switching and make too many drawn triangles).
Minimap of selected track, view from top.
Terrain height below which there won't be any grass (starts fading out, for smooth distance).

---- Quick help ----@@Use mouse or Up,Down,Enter,Backspace to navigate through menu.@@To adjust resolution go to Options tab Screen,@use Graphics presets to quickly adjust graphics to your hardware.@@To see all keys used in game and configure input goto Options, tab Input.@If you have a game controller see:@http://code.google.com/p/vdrift-ogre/wiki/Running##Controllers@@Hosting a multiplayer game requires port forwarding.@Connecting to existing game doesn't need it, provided other players have it.@@If you have problems or suggestions use our Forum:@http://forum.freegamedev.net/viewforum.php?f=77@@For more info see Readme and our project's Wiki pages.@
1 - Move LMB - plane XZ RMB - Y height
E - Height set (RMB change height value)
R G B A components 0 to 1 (eg. 0.7 0.8 0.9 1). Last can be used to lower maximum density (1 is full).
Car type, primary destination. But some cars can be used on gravel even if not meant for it.
Grass colormap for scenery, usually same choice as for grass material. Additional grass coloring.
Very powerful engine fitted car, drivable on most tracks. Not best on bumps because of short and stiff suspension. So much torque also causes more wheels spin.
Mărime triunghiuri teren în [metri](recomandat: 1 - 2, folosește mai multe pentru zone ale terenului mai mari).Se schimbă după Actualizare(F8).
Ins - insert new (after picked, alt - before)
Will ignore terrain angle and height ranges. Layer will only appear, if other layer's noise multiplier blends to this.
Preview image of this grass layer (changed with material).
Very old car with low power engine. Not fit for jumps. Pick if you want to drive slowly.
This big, extreme vehicle is great for long and smooth tracks. But completely useless when narrow or in mud (e.g. in jungle). Also not easy to drive.
Very futuristic and fast vehicle. Not suited for narrow roads, jumps or mud.
Uncheck for manual Rear gear changing.
Tire trails color. R G B A components 0 to 1 (eg. 0.4 0.4 0.2 0.6)
Tutorials have just a few tracks. They are easy to pass and show various track elements.
Another good rally car, suited for all tracks. Is not that long and thus easier to steer.
Good car for all tracks. A bit less steerable, but quite stable because of length.
Sun light ambient (constant) color. R G B components 0 to 1 (eg. 0.4 0.4 0.4)
Backspace - show/hide controls (hold ctrl to use mouse)
Track's ghost (ES car best drive for track)
K, L - change camera view to other player
Alt-Shift-Z - save file and reload game
Fog end color when looking under sun.
In tutorial/championship mode you drive a series of tracks. Minimum score (depending on your time) is needed to pass to next stage. Car changing is possible.
Auto update blendmap (slow for big size brushes)
Create a new track by duplicating the selected track and using new name (change name first).
alt-LMB - rotate (shift - global) alt-RMB - pitch (shift - roll)
Texture tiling length (less means more repeats).
Maximum distance to road. E.g. can be used for vegetation that should appear only close to road: plants, bushes etc.
Quite old, heavy, broad and slow. Good for terrain but not with the best suspension. Isn't suited for faster or stunt tracks.
Good looking, but difficult to drive, having engine at rear. Fit only for asphalt and few flat tracks. Completely undrivable at bumps,jumps,loops or pipes because of low suspension height.
When checked, Normal texture is automatically set from Diffuse texture (+ _nh in filename).
Terrain vertex count on one side (squares). Apply with buttons [New Flat] or [Resize].
LMB - rotate RMB - move MMB - zoom

Use to test blendmap clarity. The color box shows this layer's color on blendmap (is black when layer is off). Usually, a good blendmap needs to have pure layer colors with little blending (dull, mixed colors). To achieve that narrow/separate angle and height ranges and use high or low noise power.
car will meet (next+ / prev-) point numbers
Frequency of additional bumps on surface (distance between them).
; ' - change texture tiling, one coord. only
Grass material (type) for this layer, chosen to match track's scenery.
Inverse throttle and brake function in rear gear.
Press with alt to quick access gui tab (or sub-tab). Pressing again will cycle sub-tabs (if any).
Selected track name, used also for renaming track and as new track name.
Up,Down - navigate in lists Enter - start
How often model will appear on track area.
Enter - show/hide players window in multiplayer
This big wheeled utility vehicle is powered by 4 electic engines. Suited for nearly all tracks, except when narrow. Great for exploring other planets. But has bad aerodynamics and gets stuck in mud.
Prevents wheel spinning when accelerating (default: off).
M - toggle road merge segs (for test)
Wind influence on model, height scale.
ctrl-LMB - place LMB - move RMB - height
Wind influence on model, length scale.
ctrl-Ins - copy selection ctrl-Del - delete sel.
When using graphics option triplanar max 2, this layer will have triplanar mapping (good textured slopes). Affects Fps.
Visibility distance for 3d models, after this they turn into 2d impostors.
Grass Page length (low will reload often, high will cause visible switching).
Press RMB on button to unbind.
Multiplier for additional noise. +1 blends to next used layer, -1 to previous, +2 to over next.
In challenge mode the game has setup, most settings can't be changed. Time or position is needed. If you pass you receive bronze, silver or gold prize.
Tracks list, click to select (for Rename or Duplicate). Press [Load track] to change current track in editor.
Console for track errors, warnings and hints.
By default better quality (less Fps) is on right. Marked with + if on left.
Resulting area in meters (side length). Equals vertex count multipled by triangle size.
Move an axis to see its number
Pornește joc pe traseu nou sau repornește pe cel curent.
Save ghost only for best time
Default terrain error in percent. Less for flat, more for high terrains.
Grass density for layer (how often it will appear).
7 - mark checkpoint as loop begin/end (for car camera change)
Captură de ecran pentru traseul selectat
Models (meshes) for vegetation. Found in data/trees/.
Drag pentru roți,valori mari va face să încetinească mai rapid(ex.140 pentru zăpadă, 80 pentru iarbă ).
Slow and heavy car. Can handle bumps well. Is stable and easy to drive. But isn't suited for faster tracks.
Enter part of name to find (filters list).
Terrain height above which model won't appear.
shift-1 - move to cursor / reset new height
Make terrain size double, leaving current heightmap part in center.
Router port forwarding configuration might be required in order to allow peers to connect to the local port.
How dense/rare will the grass be on terrain.
B - rebuild road (after terrain change, etc.)
U - Align terrain to road (for selected segments)
Far distance at which the 2d impostors dissapear.
Disable fog when editing road from distance.
Generates new terrain from noise functions using all parameters below.
How far from road will the model appear.
Championships are usually long, have many tracks, but are easy to pass.
; ' - ajustează lățimea casetei de start (pentru lăţimea drumului)
[,] - ajustează înălțimea casetei de start (mai mare pentru conducte)
2 - Rotate local (alt- global) LMB: Z RMB: Y MMB: X
Sun light specular (shiny) color. R G B components 0 to 1 (eg. 0.6 0.6 0.6)
User Path (logs, configs, user data, etc)
Recommended use 3 or 4, with noise. Affects Fps. More than 4 will not work.
shift-3 - reset scale to 1 (with shift to 0.5)
Terrain angle above which model won't appear.
Press a button to see its number
A spaceship reworked as a hovercraft. Very fast and easy to steer. Doesn't care about terrain bumps. But currently impossible to use in pipes.
An experimental, perfectly stabilized, rotating sphere. Uses advanced spacecraft propulsion to easily move in any direction. Very fast but very bouncy. And currently impossible to use in pipes.
Year when this car's production started.
